data.title: Abdullah Ali Alewa

data.text:
Abdullah Ali Alewa (Arabic language: عبدالله علي عليوه‎; born 1947– ) is a Yemeni politician and military officer.[1][2] He served previously as chief of staff of Yemen Armed Forces and Minister of Defense.[3]

Early life and education[]

He was born in 1947 in Haban, Shabwah governorate. He grew up and studied his basic and elementary education in Aden. He obtained a master's degree in Military Sciences from Air Academy in Kyiv in 1977.[2]

Career[]

Com of the Air Force and Air Defense, South Yemen

Chief of Staff of the Army, South Yemen[1]

Deputy Minister of Defense, South Yemen[2]

Com of Al-Jawf Axis, Governor of Al-Jawf Governorate, 1992[2]

Com of Shabwa Axis, 1994[2]

Chief of Staff of Yemen Armed Forces, 1994[1]

Minister of Defense, 2001[1]

Advisor to Supreme Com of the Yemeni Armed Forces, 2006[2]
